text:
Maura Lewinger says her husband wrote her love letters every morning and left them in her lunch box.

As he died last weekend from complications of coronavirus, Lewinger said goodbye over FaceTime. "I played our wedding song for him. And then that was it." https://t.co/d0xWHlgIkf
